text.div:
Prefix Logical Model

A string that should precede the item; for example, an honorific before a person's name, or a question number before a question.

name: Prefix
title: shr-core-Prefix
publisher: HL7 Patient Care and Clinical Information Modeling Initiative Work Groups
description: A string that should precede the item; for example, an honorific before a person's name, or a question number before a question.
